title: CyclingTips Podcast: Dissecting two stunning world championships
content:
Cycling came home this week and it was wonderful! Elisa Balsamo and Julian Alaphilippe capped a wild Worlds week with victories in the elite road races.

Caley, Abby, Ronan, and Shoddy are in Flanders to dissect the two stunning world championship races and are joined by a special guest, 2003 Belgian national champion Geert Omloop.

     SUBSCRIBE TO THE ‘CYCLINGTIPS PODCAST‘
Never miss an episode. Subscribe to our CyclingTips Podcast on iTunes, Spotify,  Google, or wherever you get your podcasts.
author: Abby Mickey
